description.en: A woman (Gasolina) and her dog (Krunk) travel through an ecologically hazardous post apocalyptic America.

title.en: Henjo - Hen na Joshi Kousei Amaguri Senko

altTitles.en: Henjo - The Strange Female High-Schooler Amaguri Senko

altTitles.ja: 変女～変な女子高生 甘栗千子～

description.en: Amaguri Senko is a high school girl with a cool personality (as in kuudere) and a big pervert. She openly reads porn, masturbates and isn't perturbed in the slightest at the sight of penises and such. The story centers around Senko's daily life with two male handymen working for her father's company  which she also helps out with, Takamura Ryou and Sugita Kouhei. Takamura ends up being constantly sexually harassed by Senko, partially due to his phimosis dick that caught her interest,  but little did he know, she wasn't joking when she bluntly said "I like you"…
description.fr: Amaguri Senko est une lycéenne kuudere, mais surtout une gigantesque perverse. Elle lit ouvertement du porno, se masturbe et la vue d'un pénis ne l'affecte pas le moins du monde. Voici l'histoire de sa vie quotidienne en compagnie de deux hommes-à-tout-faire employés de la société de son père : Sugita Kouhei et Takamura Ryou. Ce dernier se retrouve constamment harcelé sexuellement par Senko, mais il est bien loin de se douter qu'elle ne plaisantait pas le jour où elle lui a dit qu'elle l'aimait…

description.en: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

Yeonho is a military officer who uses his supernatural abilities to protect the people from various demon-like beasts. Although the abilities he possesses are extraordinary, his energy gets thrown into a frenzy upon exceedingly long usage, and he loses consciousness if he isn't purified right after subduing those ferocious beasts.
Yet, upon opening his eyes the next morning, he realizes that his frenzied energy had unbelievably disappeared after having sexual intercourse with someone while unconscious!
Having suspicions that the Purifier, Haejin, who has only ever been overtly concerned about his clan's authority and influence, couldn't have possibly purified him, Yeonho pretends to lose consciousness once again... Only to grab hold of Haeryung, the Purifier who enters his room for purification, and who is clearly a stranger but possesses an oddly familiar aura.
"Who... are you?"
description.fr:
Yeonho est un officier militaire qui utilise ses capacités surnaturelles pour protéger la population de diverses bêtes démoniaques. Bien que les capacités qu'il possède soient extraordinaires, son énergie devient frénétique après une utilisation excessivement longue, et il perd conscience s'il n'est pas purifié juste après avoir maîtrisé ces bêtes féroces.
Pourtant, en ouvrant les yeux le lendemain matin, il se rend compte que son énergie frénétique a incroyablement disparu après avoir eu des rapports sexuels avec quelqu'un alors qu'il était inconscient !
Se doutant que le purificateur Haejin, qui ne s'est jamais préoccupé que de l'autorité et de l'influence de son clan, n'aurait pas pu le purifier, Yeonho fait semblant de perdre conscience une fois de plus... Seulement pour s'accrocher à Haeryung, le Purificateur qui entre dans sa chambre pour le purifier, et qui est clairement un étranger mais possède une aura étrangement familière.

"Qui... êtes-vous ?"

title.en: Super no Ura de Yani Suu Futari

altTitles.ja: スーパーの裏でヤニ吸うふたり

altTitles.id: Cerita Tentang Merokok di Belakang Supermarket

altTitles.es-la: Historias que ocurren al fumar en la parte trasera del supermercado

altTitles.pt-br: Uma história sobre fumar no fundo de um mercadinho

altTitles.zh-hk: 在超市後門吸菸的二人

altTitles.en: Smoking Behind the Supermarket with You
Behind the Supermarket, Smoking With You

altTitles.ja-ro: Super no Ura de Yani Suu Futari

altTitles.fr: Fumer en bonne compagnie à l'arrière de la supérette
Deux fumeurs à l'arrière de la supérette

altTitles.en: A Story About Smoking at the Back of the Supermarket

description.en:
Sasaki, an overworked salaryman, goes through an average stressful day just for a single light at the end of the tunnel: Yamada, the always-cheerful clerk at his favorite convenience store. 

One day, Sasaki takes an extra amount of time at a company meeting, and by the time he gets to the convenience store Yamada has already clocked out. However, as he leaves, he notices a young woman with piercings smoking behind the store?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Manga UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/261)
description.ru:
Сасаки, переутомлённый служащий, каждый раз проживает обычный напряжённый день ради единственного света в конце туннеля: Ямада, жизнерадостная продавщица в его любимом магазинчике.
В один день, Сасаки задержался на работе и когда он возвращался домой через магазинчик, смена Ямады давно закончилась. Однако, когда он вышел, то заметил молодую женщину с пирсингом курящую за магазином.
description.vi: Sasaki - một người đàn ông làm công ăn lương, vượt qua những ngày làm việc mệt nhoài nhờ có tia sáng nơi cuối đường hầm: Yamada - nhân viên bán hàng luôn vui tươi tại siêu thị tiện lợi yêu thích của anh. Một ngày nọ, Sasaki phải ở lại công ty đến muộn vì một cuộc họp nên khi đến cửa hàng, Yamada đã hết giờ làm việc. Tuy nhiên, khi sắp rời đi, anh để ý thấy một cô gái trẻ đeo những chiếc khuyên xỏ đang ngồi hút thuốc phía sau cửa hàng…
description.es-la: Sasaki, un asalariado con exceso de trabajo, pasa por un día estresante promedio solo por una sola luz al final del túnel: Yamada, la siempre alegre empleada de su tienda de conveniencia favorita. Un día, Sasaki se toma una cantidad extra de tiempo en una reunión de la empresa, y cuando llega a la tienda de conveniencia, Yamada ya se había marchado. Sin embargo, cuando se va, se da cuenta de que una mujer joven con piercings fuma detrás de la tienda......
description.pt-br:
Sasaki, um assalariado sobrecarregado, passa por um dia estressante comum apenas por uma única luz no fim do túnel: Yamada, o sempre alegre balconista de sua loja de conveniência favorita.

Um dia, Sasaki leva um tempo extra em uma reunião da empresa e, quando chega à loja de conveniência, Yamada já bateu o ponto. No entanto, ao sair, ele percebe uma jovem com piercings fumando atrás da loja. O que vai se desenrolar?

altTitles.th: ร้อยเรียงรักจากหัวใจ

description.de: Als die gehörlose Studentin Yuki eines Tages in Schwierigkeiten gerät, kommt ihr ihr Kommilitone Itsuomi zu Hilfe. Yuki ist fasziniert von Itsuomi, da er sie trotz ihres Handicaps wie einen ganz normalen Menschen behandelt. Durch ihn beginnt Yuki nicht nur eine neue Welt zu entdecken, sondern bekommt auch zum ersten Mal Herzklopfen.
description.en:
One day, Yuki, a university student, is in trouble when she is rescued by Itsuomi, a senior student at the same university. Even though Yuki is deaf due to a hearing impairment, Itsuomi is unfazed and treats her naturally. Yuki gradually becomes aware of Itsuomi, who makes her feel a new world...

---
Yuki is a typical college student, whose world revolves around her friends, social media, and the latest sales. But when a chance encounter on a train leads to her meeting friend-of-a-friend and fellow student Itsuomi-san, her world starts to widen. But even though Itsuomi-kun can speak three languages, sign language isn't one of them. Can the two learn to communicate the budding feelings between them?
description.es: La vida de Yuki, una universitaria con sordera, va a dar un vuelco cuando en su camino se cruce el joven Itsuomi, un muchacho que, a pesar de dominar varios idiomas, no conoce la lengua de signos japonesa. Itsuomi se interesa enseguida en Yuki y desea aprender la lengua de signos y, sobre todo, entrar en el mundo de ella. Signos de afecto es una historia de amor sobre la necesidad de la comunicación, sobre el aprendizaje de las diferencias y sobre la empatía.
description.fr:
Yuki est une étudiante qui, comme beaucoup d'autres, construit son quotidien autour de ses amis, des réseaux sociaux et de ce qu'elle aime. Mais quand un jour, dans le train, elle croise un jeune homme qui voyage à travers le monde, son univers va être chamboulé: ce dernier, bien que trilingue, ne connaît pas la langue des signes. Pourtant, très vite, il manifestera pour elle un intérêt bien particulier… Comment réagira-t-elle face à ce camarade d'université entreprenant et communicatif?

A sign of affection décrit avec pudeur et simplicité l'histoire d'amour entre une jeune femme sourde et un grand voyageur. à n'en pas douter, les personnages de ce manga ne manqueront pas de vous émouvoir!
description.it: Un giorno, in un momento di difficoltà, una studentessa universitaria di nome Yuki viene aiutata da Itsuomi, un senpai che frequenta il suo stesso istituto. Il giovane la tratta con grande naturalezza e non si scompone minimamente quando capisce che la ragazza è sorda. Ben presto, Yuki scoprirà di provare qualcosa per quel ragazzo, grazie al quale ha cominciato a percepire la realtà in maniera del tutto nuova...
description.ja: 女子大生の雪は、ある日困っているところを同じ大学の先輩・逸臣に助けてもらう。聴覚障がいがあって耳が聴こえない雪にも動じることなく、自然に接してくれる逸臣。自分に新しい世界を感じさせてくれる逸臣のことを雪は次第に意識し始めて…！？
description.ko: 여대생 유키는 어느날 곤란에 처해있을 때 같은 대학 선배인 이츠오미의 도움을 받는다. 청각장애가 있어 귀가 들리지 않는 유키에게도 동요하지 않고 자연스럽게 대해주는 이츠오미. 자신에게 새로운 세계를 느끼게 해준 이츠오미를 유키는 점점 의식하기 시작하는데…?!
description.pt: Yuki é uma típica estudante universitária que nasceu surda. Ela ama estar perto dos seus amigos, redes sociais e fazer compras. Certo dia, ela recebe ajuda de Itsuomi, um estudante da mesma universidade que ela, enquanto estava no metrô. A partir daí, nasce uma amizade entre eles que se torna cada vez mais especial. "Neste dia, Yuki sentiu o seu mundo mudar."
description.ru: Это нежная история о любви между глухонемой девушкой и парнем, говорящем на нескольких языках и облетевшем мир, как много они могут привнести и изменить в мирах друг друга? Ицуоми выручает Юки, оказывается, что они учатся в одном университете. Случайная встреча, заинтересованность, стремление, желание… Что же Юки постепенно осознает?..
description.th: วันหนึ่ง ขณะกำลังตกที่นั่งลำบาก ยูคิ นักศึกษาสาว ได้อิสึโอมิ รุ่นพี่นักศึกษามหา'ลัยเดียวกันช่วยไว้แม้ยูคิจะไม่ได้ยินเสียงเพราะมีความบกพร่องทางการได้ยินแต่อิสึมิก็ยังทำตัวปกติเป็นธรรมชาติกับเธออย่างใจเย็นจากนั้นยูคิก็เริ่มสนใจอิสึมิที่ช่วยตัวเองได้สัมผัสถึงโลกใบใหม่ขึ้นมา...!?
description.tr: Tüm dünyası arkadaşları, sosyal medyası ve çok satanları etrafında dönen Yuki, tipik bir üniversite öğrencisidir. Ancak bir trende, bir arkadaşının arkadaşı olan İtsuomi-san ile tanışma şansı olunca dünyası genişlemeye başlar. Fakat maalesef, her ne kadar İtsuomi-kun üç dil konuşabilse de, işaret dili onlardan biri değildir. İkisi, aralarındaki tomurcuklanan duyguları birbirine iletmeyi öğrenebilecek mi?
description.uk:
Юкі — студентка. Як і в багатьох інших ровесників, її повсякденне життя обертається навколо друзів, соцмереж, загалом усього, що їй подобається. Та якось вона випадково зустріла в потязі юнака, що любить подорожувати, і її світ перевернувся.

Іцуомі трилінгв, однак не знає японської мови жестів.

Проте незабаром він нею особливо зацікавиться… Як Юкі відреагує на цього впертого однокурсника, який прагне подружитися з нею? «A Sign of affection» лаконічно і просто описує історію кохання дівчини з порушенням слуху та завзятого мандрівника. Без сумніву, стосунки між героями цієї манґи неодмінно вас зворушать!
description.zh: 自從與你相遇之后，我的世界出現了改變的聲音。
description.pt-br:
Yuki é uma típica estudante universitária que nasceu surda, cujo mundo gira em torno de seus amigos, redes sociais e as últimas vendas. Mas quando um encontro casual em um trem a leva a conhecer o amigo de um amigo e colega estudante Itsuomi-san, seu mundo começa a se ampliar. Mas mesmo que Itsuomi-kun fale três línguas, a linguagem de sinais não é uma delas.  

Os dois podem aprender a comunicar os sentimentos que estão surgindo entre eles?

altTitles.en: I Will Become the Hero's Mother
I Became the Mother of the Warrior

description.en:
"You may be my wife but, I won't lay a single finger on you."

"Really? Then can I touch you?"

"...What?"

About 20 years later, the world will be in ruins because of the invasion of the beasts. There's only one way to stop the destruction. To marry the duke who is called a monster, and have his child who will become the hero in the future!

Elena who saw a glimpse of the future succeeded in marrying him but...

"Are we going to continue to not do anything?"

I wanted to get it quickly out of the way, but my husband's impregnable fortress is stronger than I could have imagined!

"Take it off! Why aren't you taking it off?! Are your clothes part of your skin?"

Will Elena be able to safely give birth to the hero and save the world?

title.en: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kitan - Jack the Ripper no Jikenbo

altTitles.en: Record of Ragnarok: Jack the Ripper Case Files

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ奇譚 ジャック・ザ・リッパーの事件簿

altTitles.ru: Повесть о Конце Света: Досье по делам Джека Потрошителя
Повесть о Конце Света: Досье Джека-потрошителя

description.en: In 1888, a number of prostitutes were murdered in London, by someone known only as "Jack the Ripper". The murderer takes to the streets each day, looking to slit some unfortunate woman open... The past of Jack the Ripper, the English gentleman who represented the human side in the fourth round of the struggle between God and mankind known as Ragnarok, who was one of the top-three most popular characters in the character poll, is finally revealed!

Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!
description.fr:
Taro Sakamoto est un assassin légendaire, le meilleur d'entre tous, craint par tous les gangsters, adulé par ses pairs. Mais un beau jour... il tombe amoureux ! S'ensuivent retraite, mariage, paternité... et prise de poids.
Sakamoto est aujourd'hui patron d'une petite épicerie de quartier et coule des jours heureux avec sa famille. Mais lorsque son passé le rattrape sous les traits de Shin, un jeune assassin télépathe, Sakamoto reprend du service...
Et malgré son apparence, il est toujours aussi charismatique lorsqu'il passe à l'action !
description.ja: 町の商店を営むふくよかな男・坂本太郎。その正体は全ての悪党が恐れ、憧れた元・伝説の殺し屋!!　襲い来る危険から家族と日常を守る、坂本の日々とは…!?
description.ru: Таро Сакамото был профессиональным киллером. Другие наёмники им восхищались, а злодеи боялись. Но однажды… Сакамото влюбился! Завязал с криминалом, женился, стал отцом и в итоге… Разжирел! Толстый дядька из соседнего магазина — в прошлом непревзойдённый убийца! Сможет ли он уберечь свою семью от опасности? Приготовьтесь к новой остросюжетной комедии!
description.pt-br: Taro Sakamoto era o assassino supremo, temido pelos vilões e admirado pelos assassinos. Mas um dia... ele se apaixonou! Aposentadoria, casamento, paternidade e depois… Sakamoto engordou! O cara gordinho que administra a loja do bairro é na verdade um ex-assassino lendário! Ele pode proteger sua família do perigo? Prepare-se para experimentar um novo tipo de série de comédia de ação!

altTitles.en: First Love Like a Sweet Honey

description.en: I don't have family, friends or a boyfriend. But there's someone I love. We have that strange relationship: childhood friend.

altTitles.en: The Young Lady Is a Royal Chef

altTitles.es: La princesa es un chef imperial

altTitles.ja: お嬢様はロイヤル・シェフ

description.en:
Sena’s been tossed into another world, as the despised daughter of a noble family. Her little restaurant was her refuge in her last life, so she’s got some tricks up her sleeve—cooking skills! 

As Senianna, she’ll put her brains and fine-tuned taste buds (Korean fried chicken, anyone?) to the test so she can take back the kitchen and gain this society’s esteemed title of Chef Royale. Will her cuisine reign supreme over the empire and bring her the sweet and salty balance of power and affection?

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)
---
As a chef at a small knight's restaurant, I became the nuisance youngest daughter of a powerful man who was afraid of the emperor. I tried to run away with all my travel expenses…

It’s strange.

“If you say you're sorry, are you that shameless?”
“That’s because I’m your brother.”
“Why don't you take Grandmother on a stroll?”

Why is everyone so nice to me all of a sudden?

“Why do you want to take out someone's eyeballs when they see me?"

People who had caught me trying to escape. I'm just cooking. What's wrong with you?
description.id:
Aku yang dulu hidup dalam penderitaan sewaktu kecil, kini berhasil menjalankan restoran kecil di pinggir jalan dengan guruku yang menjadi orang tua sekaligus teman terbaikku.

Hingga suatu saat, guruku meninggal. Tapi, kemalanganku tidak berhenti di sana. Aku meninggal dan mendapati diriku di dunia lain. Aku kembali hidup sebagai cucu orang paling kuat di wilayah timur?!

Mendapati diriku sebagai Seniana, sekarang aku harus berjuang menjalani hidup dan menjadi royal chef paling hebat!

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)
description.ko:
작은 기사 식당의 요리사였던 나는 황제도 두려워하는 권력가의 천덕꾸러기 막내딸이 되었다.
여비를 저축해 도망치려고 했는데…

이상하다.

"네게 미안하다고 하면 염치가 없는 건가."
"그야 내가 네 오빠니까."
"할애비와 산책해 주지 않는 거냐."

다들 갑자기 왜 잘해 주는 거지?

"너를 보는 놈들의 눈알을 죄 뽑아 버리고 싶은 건 왜일까요."

도망치려는 나와 붙잡는 사람들.
요리만 했을 뿐인데 왜 이러는 거람…

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)

description.en:
*By Seishun Scans: WARNING! This series contains scenes that may depict sexual harassment, attempted sexual assault, and/or verbal abuse. Reader discretion is advised!*

---

Shinra has a mother who rarely comes home. Everyday, she pinches her pennies just to survive. Rai, a popular guy from her school keeps bothering her, and she’s getting sexually harassed by the manager at her part-time job. After finally coming home after 2 months, Shinra’s mom promises to stay with her. Rai unexpectedly shows up at Shinra’s part-time job and sees her being sexually harassed. He urges her to quit, but she refuses. Shinra comes home only to find out that her mother has disappeared once again

altTitles.en: Witches Bloom Under the Full Moon

description.en: Koichi Hotaka is a second-year junior high school student who is a bit of a shy. One day, he meets a mysterious girl, Shima, who calls herself the "Witch of Alstroemeria" and is chosen as her "contractor". A fantasy of love and magic set on the night of the full moon!
description.ja: 帆高航一（ほたか　こういち）はちょっとコジラセ気味な中学2年生。そんな彼はある日、「アルストロメリアの魔女」を名乗る謎の少女・紫麻（しま）と出会い、彼女の“契約者”に選ばれる。満月の夜を舞台に繰り広げられる、恋と魔法のファンタジー！
description.zh: 帆高航一是个有点内向的初二学生。某一天，他遇到了一个神秘的女孩紫麻，她自称“阿尔斯特罗梅里亚的女巫”，并被选为她的“契约者”。 在满月之夜缔结的爱情和魔法的幻想故事！

altTitles.en: レンタルおにいちゃん

description.en: What the young girl rents is not a movie, but a brother, and the wonderful warm feeling of spending time with him. With her parents deceased, and her once kind brother changed… What the girl seeks is the warmth of a family that she once had. Even if it's a rental one.
description.id:
Menceritakan seorang anak perempuan bernama Kanami, dia mempunyai kakak yang baik dan perhatian terhadapnya, namun sebuah insiden tidak terduga terjadi yang membuat kakaknya tersebut berubah drastis dari kakak yang baik dan perhatian berubah menjadi kakak yang tidak peduli terhadap sekitarnya, karena hal itu Kanami merasa diasingkan dan tidak dipedulikan. Namun, sesuatu yang tidak terduga terjadi…  
  
**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/ichiiro_hako)   
- [Author's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=11877871)
description.pt: O que a garota alugou foi, um tempo feliz e amigável com seu falso irmão. A morte de seus pais… A completa mudança de seu irmão que era gentil… A garota que agora está sozinha e ferida, almejando a gentileza que um dia viu em seu irmão… Diz: Eu vou alugar um irmão! …Com dinheiro. Mesmo alugando, eu quero ter uma "família".

title.en: The Duke of Death and His Maid

altTitles.fr: Le duc de la Mort et sa gouvernante obscure

altTitles.ru: Смертоносный герцог и его черная горничная

altTitles.ar: النبيل الشاب حاصد الأرواح و خادمته السوداء

altTitles.ja: 死神坊ちゃんと黒メイド

altTitles.en: The Duke of Death and His Black Maid

altTitles.pt-br: O duque da morte e sua empregada

description.en:
In a large mansion lives a boy, an aristocrat who was cursed by the witch to "let everything he touches die." With him is his maid Alice, who besides serving him, likes to tease him. The boy who is interested in her doesn't mind the teasing, but not being able to touch her is painful!  
  
If they are unable to hold hands, how will their love ever bloom?
description.tr: Hikâye büyük bir malikanede yaşayan kaderi bir cadı tarafından mühürlenen bir çocuk ve onunla beraber yaşayan hizmetçi Alice hakkında; çocuk dokunduğu her şeyi ölüme sürüklerken; Alice ile hiç el ele tutuşamayacak olmalarına rağmen yaşanan inişli çıkışlı bir aşk.

altTitles.en: ผูกใจไว้ใกล้ ๆ เธอ

description.en: A red thread exists between a guy and girl that are fated to be together, a bond that can't be seen by the naked eye. Finally, this fated romantic love will begin to open its curtain.

title.en: Tenka Musou no Otome-tachi ga Ore no Kodane wo Ubaiatteimasu!!!!!

altTitles.ja: 天下無双の乙女たちが俺の子種を奪い合っています!!!!!

description.en: Shinichi is the only son of Takako Gotenji, the strongest female fighter in Japan. Despite this, he is not very good at seeing people get hurt, and he would never be interested in martial arts! He has made up his mind that he will never follow in the footsteps of the dojo. Then suddenly five beautiful girls appear in front of Shinichi. They are the strong fighting girls who have been scouted as the heirs to the dojo! But in fact, they are all potential brides for Shinichi, and the only condition for marriage is that they have to squeeze his penis...?

"Excuse me, are you Korean?"

Due to a recent heartbreak, Hanjoon arrives at New York.

Not only is he delighted to meet a Korean in an unfamiliar city,
he has a one-night stand with him.

"I should've asked for his name."

However, these two end up meeting again in an unusual place.

Where will their one-night stand in the artist's city of New York lead them to?
description.pl:
"Przepraszam, jesteś Koreańczykiem?"

Z powodu niedawnego złamanego serca Hanjoon przybywa do Nowego Jorku.

Nie tylko jest zachwycony spotkaniem Koreańczyka w nieznanym mieście,
ma z nim jednonocną przygodę.

"Powinienem był zapytać o jego imię".

Jednak ta dwójka spotyka się ponownie w nietypowym miejscu.

Dokąd zaprowadzi ich jednonocna przygoda w mieście artysty, Nowym Jorku?

title.en: A Boyish Girlfriend in High Humidity

altTitles.ja: 湿度高めのボーイッシュ彼女

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/115806876)

Historie takes place in ancient Greece and follows the life of Eumenes and his childhood, who would later in his life grow up to be the secretary and general to Alexander the Great.  
  
**IMPORTANT:**   
- Hitoshi Iwaaki frequently redoes the art for volume releases as well as add smaller chapters together.   
- There are no missing chapters on MangaDex, Chapter 108 "Warped" immediately follows Chapter 97 "Disposal of Olympias (2)", this is because chapters were added together in previous volumes, so the chapter count between volume and magazine are out of sync.  
  
---
- **Won the 16th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize's Grand Prize in 2012 for Manga**  
-  **Won the 14th Japan Media Arts Festival Grand Prize for Manga**
description.pt-br: Historie se passa na Grécia Antiga e traça a desconhecida juventude de Eumênio de Cárdia, secretário e general de Alexandre, O Grande. Acompanhando sua infância até seu encontro com Alexandre, o autor entrelaça muitos acontecimentos históricos da antiguidade, criando um perfil audacioso e carismático de um homem que estava à frente de seu tempo, dando uma nova perspectiva sobre seu caráter, modo de pensar, suas conquistas e o legado que deixou.

title.en: The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.zh: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Dà Shīxiōng, Shīmèimen Quán Shì Bìng Jiāo
Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

altTitles.en: The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate
The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.es-la: El Gran Villano Hermano Mayor y todas sus Hermanas Menores Yandere

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

A fantasy about a different world that celebrates life and sings of love.

A healer who has the unique ability to cure disease and is said to be the world's last hope. While on an overseas expedition, Laila, a newcomer to the world, meets a beautiful demoness named Lail, who is kept in the royal castle.  The two live out their predetermined destiny, and what develops between these two.

title.en: A plot twist is a plot twist plot twist

altTitles.en: Reversal of the Twist of the Inversion

description.en:
"I'm pregnant, and I'd like to marry him."
Seoho decides to suddenly arrange a marriage with a man he claims to have had a baby with.
He introduces a man who turns out to be Ko Eunhyun, an alpha and the wealthy son of a famous hotel's chaebol family.
In reality, they had only met yesterday in an one-night stand, 
but who cares about the little details!

title.en: The Martial God Who Regressed Back to Level 2

altTitles.en: The God of War Who Regressed to Level 2

altTitles.es-la: El dios marcial que regresó al nivel 2

description.en:
[NO. 4212: 'Humanity' has failed the Demotion Match.]
[NO. 4212: ‘Humanity’ has been deemed useless. Beginning deletion.]

Earth lost the fight for survival in the BattleNet system and humanity now faces eradication. However, Jihan Seong is given another chance. He has returned three years into the past before BattleNet became a life-or-death game.

With his knowledge of the future, he’s determined to become the strongest player. Will Jihan be able to change the fate of humanity? And more importantly, can he protect the ones he loves from those who want him to fail?

A red hibiscus tops the fence so tall,
Passersby greet but leave without a call.
This humble flower, unworthy of a vase,
Would lose its glow by morning’s soft embrace.
 
Summer's breezes whisper by,
Hesitant they float and shy.
Carrying forest scents anew,
While hibiscus stays blushing in the dew.

Tomorrow, when the winds return,
The hibiscus longs for sweet scents to burn.
A flower with just beauty's grace,
Lacks a fragrance to embrace.
 
Winds, aware of this design,
Bestow the summer’s scent so fine.
The hibiscus blooms at dawn’s first light,
A truth strange, a wonder in sight.
 
Yet fate cannot be denied,
Blaming winds for love untried.
Without waiting for the day to break,
A silent farewell, hard to forsake.
 
Winds wander, searching for a face,
Is it the one who lost the race?
...

Bach Tu Chi is a young master from the wealthy Bach family. Despite being only 17 years old, he suffers from severe tuberculosis and faces a challenging family situation, having grown up without his father's love and experiencing conflicts with his relatives. Fortunately, he meets Luu Trac Vu, an orphaned boy who roams the streets. Bach Tu Chi takes him in to be his close servant. Since bringing Trac Vu home, Bach Tu Chi has developed a fondness for this servant...
We just broke up but we live together? Coming Soon April 27th.

One day, Kaoru Uno suddenly starts seeing mysterious monsters known as shiryo or death spirits. With the arrival of his late father's coworker Yoji Amane and a special ring his father gave him, Kaoru is ushered into the world of necromancers! From the creator of Aliens Area comes a fantastic new series of necromancer battles!

(from ebookjapan):

The series has sold over 8.3 million copies! The gold standard of zombie manga, "I Am a Hero," is now available in a "complete edition" with a new cover design, reprinted color pages from the serialization, and over 80 pages of new artwork in the final 22 volumes! Witness the new ending of the story. 

He is 35 year old who spends his time as an assistant to a mangaka, sometimes escaping into delusion in order to win over the agonizing reality. One day, however, a mysterious infection begins to spread without him noticing...and the real world begins to break down...⁉ 

He wanders into a world where the ordinary and the extraordinary, the mundane and the insane intersect. A personal survival panic horror story! 

[Official English](https://www.darkhorse.com/Books/25-142/I-Am-a-Hero-Omnibus-Volume-1-TPB)

---  
- **Won the 58th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2013**

---

- Adapted into a Live Action film in 2016. Link to the [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=24660) Page
description.pl:
Hideo Suzuki to 35­‑latek pracujący jako asystent znanego twórcy mang. Na pozór wydaje się zwyczajnym człowiekiem, balansuje jednak na granicy choroby psychicznej, ma olbrzymie problemy z funkcjonowaniem w społeczeństwie i kontaktach z innymi ludźmi. Jak ktoś taki poradzi sobie w świecie opanowywanym przez zombie?  
 Mangę charakteryzuje bardzo poważne podejście do tematu i zorientowanie na psychikę bohatera oraz analizę ludzkiej osobowości.  
 Yumi - 25 maja 2011
description.pt-br: Hideo Suzuki é um assistente de mangaká de 35 anos de idade lutando para ser um herói em sua própria vida, dividido pelo trabalho na série em que é assistente "lime light" e com uma série nova ao mesmo tempo, equilibrando seu relacionamento com sua namorada e seus próprios delírios. No entanto, tão difícil como Hideo pode imaginar, o mundo parece ter um conjunto de planos diferentes para ele; maquinações sinistras e obscuras que derrubam completamente a sua realidade e como ele a vê.

altTitles.th: ลิขิตรักบัลลังก์ต่างโลก

description.en: Crossing over into another world and time after a freak accident, Korean highschool girl Sabina is taken in by a duke of the Crentia kingdom— only to soon be offered up to the ugly old emperor as a concubine. When the king is killed by a mysterious assassin, Sabina must face the poisonous circle of other candidates in a battle for the royal seat. Can she attract the loyalty and affection of the men and women she needs on her side to survive?

altTitles.en: Ended Up Living with a Classmate

altTitles.ja-ro: Classmate to Issho ni Sumu Koto ni Natte shimatta

altTitles.ja: クラスメイトと一緒に住むことになってしまった

description.en: It's a collection of short manga stories about interacting with a girl, sometimes romantically and sometimes not.

title.en: Drawing: Saikyou Mangaka wa Oekaki Skill de Isekai Musou Suru!

altTitles.ja: ドローイング 最強漫画家はお絵かきスキルで異世界無双する！

altTitles.en: Drawing: The Greatest Mangaka Becomes a Skilled “Martial Artist” in Another World

altTitles.zh-hk: 作畫 最強漫畫家利用繪畫技能在異世界開無雙！

description.en:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life.. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?

The story of two foreign men living in Japan.

(from ebookjapan):

Nick, with his stylish hair, and Lever, with his dazzling eyes behind his sunglasses, are a HOT & CRAZY foreign duo who will face any obstacles that come their way! 

The genius Kyogoro Miyata, who wastes no time in drawing, unleashes a shocking high-speed manga. Nick and Lever are finally here!
description.es-la: Esta es la historia de dos extranjeros que viven en Japón: Nick, con su elegante melena, y Lever, con sus deslumbrantes ojos que se ocultan detrás de sus gafas de sol. Este alocado dúo se enfrentará a cualquier obstáculo que se les presente mientras tratan de sobrevivir día a día en la tierra del sol naciente.

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.

altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
There’s more to this kitty than meets the eye! Kyuu-chan loves snacks, cuddles, and bow ties, but most of all loves Hinata, the young professional who adopted this mischievous wonder cat into his home.

As the two adjust to life together, they discover that they have a lot to learn from each other.

The ordinary and the extraordinary live side by side in this delightful slice-of-life manga!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

title.en: Tenohira Kaitaku Mura de Isekai Kenkokuki: Fueteku Yome-tachi to Nonbiri Mujintou Life

altTitles.en: Country Building Story in Another World with the Pioneering Village in His Palm: Easy Life on the Uninhabited Island with His Ever Increasing Wives
Foundation of a State in Another World With a Hand-Built Colony Village: Carefree Life on an Uninhabitated Island With an Increasing Number of Brides

altTitles.ja: Tenohira Kaitakumura de Isekai Kenkouki: Fueteku Yome-tachi to Nonbiri Mujintou Raifu

altTitles.en: With Single Palm Founding a Pioneering Village a in Another World: Live With The Married Girls in Uninhabited Island Life

altTitles.ja: てのひら開拓村で異世界建国記〜増えてく嫁たちとのんびり無人島ライフ〜

altTitles.zh: 在掌中开拓村的异世界建国记

altTitles.ja-ro: Tenohira Kaitaku Mura de Isekai Kenkoku-ki: Fuete ku Yome-tachi to Nonbiri Mujintō Life

altTitles.zh-hk: 在掌中開拓村的異世界建國記

description.en:
Kai, a sickly kid, wished for a lively normal life on his deathbed when he was suddenly reincarnated into another world. Not only the boy’s wishes were fulfilled, he was also gifted an ability to be a god of his own little world at the back of his palm. Yet such bliss did not last long…  
  
Kai was abruptly separated from his loving adopted family and banished into an uninhabited island teeming with dangerous creatures. Using his ingenious wit and a help from a mysterious horned girl, Kai managed to survive and establish a small foothold with his army of cute stubby helpers.  
  
Watch as Kai tries to further tame this wilderness, building up his sanctuary and harem. Easy living!

title.en: I Won't Let Mistress Suck My Blood

altTitles.ja: ご主人様には吸わせません！

description.en: Matilda is looking for a job and a place to stay, and ends up in a large mansion known as the "Haunted House." The owner of the house, August, is a beautiful, soft-spoken woman, and Matilda is attracted to her and decides to work for her as a maid. However, that night, Matilda finds that her master has transformed.
description.id: Matilda mencari pekerjaan dan tempat tinggal, dan berakhir di sebuah rumah besar yang dikenal sebagai “Mansion Berhantu”. Pemilik rumah, August, adalah seorang wanita cantik yang bersuara lembut, dan Matilda tertarik padanya dan memutuskan untuk bekerja untuknya sebagai pembantu. Namun, pada malam itu, Matilda mendapati bahwa majikannya telah berubah.

altTitles.ja: 僕の声を聞いてほしい!!

description.en:
Ye QiaoWen, an older sister-childhood-neighbor of our protagonist whom he has always admired has just recently moved back.

But Deng XianHe, the protagonist, has just recently learned that she already has someone else in her heart — a fact that suffers Deng XianHe greatly.

Suddenly seeing his usually bright and capable older sister turn into someone who is always hesitant and confused, Deng XianHe chose to suppress his years-long feelings of love, anguish, and longing.
description.ja:
隣に住んでいた憧れのお姉さん・葉巧玟（イエチャオウェン）がこの町に戻ってきて、なし崩し的に高校生の僕・鄧賢和（ドンシアンホー）と同居することに。いつも颯爽としていてなんでもできる巧姉（チャオねえ）のはずが、僕の前では間抜けで優柔不断でダメダメな社会人だった!? さらに、バイト先で知りあったカッコいい先輩と、素直で明るい同級生。僕を囲む3人の女子はそれぞれが悩みを抱えていて……。楽しくもほろ苦い青春ドラマの幕が上がる!!

---
**Links:**
- [Official Japanese 1](https://comic.webnewtype.com/contents/bokukoe)
- [Official Japanese 2](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_KS12204287010000_68)
- [Official Japanese 3](https://web-ace.jp/comicnewtype/contents/693/)
- [Official Japanese 4](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64961)
description.pt-br:
Ye Qiao Wen, uma velha companheira, vizinha de infância de nosso protagonista, a quem ele sempre admirou, mudou-se recentemente.

Mas Deng Xian He, o protagonista, descobriu recentemente que ela já tem outra pessoa em seu coração - um fato que o deixa muito magoado.

De repente, ao ver sua velha companheira, geralmente brilhante e capaz, se transformar em alguém sempre hesitante e confuso, Deng Xian He optou por reprimir seus sentimentos de amor, angústia e saudade que já duravam anos.
description.zh-hk: 從小憧憬的鄰居大姐姐葉巧玟最近搬回來了，但少年鄧賢和卻得知她心中另有所屬的消息，澆熄了鄧賢和多年來的思念。看見平常精明幹練的大姐姐，在自己面前卻變成迷糊、做事猶豫不決的迷茫社會人，少年隱忍着失戀的情緒，第一次想對她發出怒吼，卻還是同

description.en:
At Grace Field House, life couldn't be better for the orphans! Though they have no parents, together with the other kids and a kind "Mama" who cares for them, they form one big, happy family. No child is ever overlooked, especially since they are all adopted by the age of 12. Their daily lives involve rigorous tests, but afterwards, they are allowed to play outside.   
  
There is only one rule they must obey: do not leave the orphanage. But one day, two top-scoring orphans, Emma and Norman, venture past the gate and unearth the horrifying reality behind their entire existence: they are all livestock, and their orphanage is a farm to cultivate food for a mysterious race of demons. With only a few months left to pull off an escape plan, the children must somehow change their predetermined fate.  

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Promised Neverland** (2019)
description.fr:
Emma, Norman et Ray coulent des jours heureux à l’orphelinat Grace Field House. Entourés de leurs petits frères et sœurs, ils s’épanouissent sous l’attention pleine de tendresse de « Maman », qu'ils considèrent comme leur véritable mère. Mais tout bascule le soir où ils découvrent l’abominable réalité qui se cache derrière la façade de leur vie paisible ! Ils doivent s’échapper, c’est une question de vie ou de mort !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.pt:
Na “Casa de Grace Field” habitam 38 crianças órfãs.
Vivem felizes com a sua cuidadora, Isabella, a quem as crianças tratam como mãe. Mas certo dia, Emma e Norman descobrem que a Casa de Grace Field é afinal uma “quinta” cujo objetivo é criar alimento para monstros.
As remessas de crianças enviadas são escolhidas pela sua inteligência e desempenho em testes, que servem para tornar os seus cérebros… mais saborosos!
Não querendo perder mais nenhum membro da sua família, Norman e Emma começam a reunir informação vital para a sua sobrevivência e planeiam a sua fuga do orfanato.
description.ru:
Эмма и её друзья вели вполне счастливую сиротскую жизнь в приюте. Да, там жёсткие правила, но зато смотритель добрый. Вот только почему детям запрещено приближаться к воротам и забору?.. Иногда не известно, стоит ли узнавать правду, которая полностью переворачивает всю твою жизнь.  
  
- Won the 63rd Shogakukan Manga Awards in 2018 in the best shounen category.
  


---

**Links:]**   
- [Demizu's Twitter](https://twitter.com/DemizuPosuka)   
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=21552)  
- [Anime Season 2 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23263)
description.pt-br: Emma, Norman e Ray são as crianças mais brilhantes do orfanato Grace Field House. E, sob os cuidados da mulher a que se referem como “mamãe”, todas as crianças tiveram uma vida confortável. Boa comida, roupas limpas e o ambiente perfeito para aprender - o que mais um órfão poderia querer? Um dia, porém, Emma e Norman descobrem a verdade sombria do mundo exterior que eles estão proibidos de ver.

description.en:
Nako is a high school girl who falls in love with her cool and mysterious private teacher.
She loves her teacher and wants to act on her love, but sometimes it doesn't work out...
This is a heart-warming slice of life manga about the daily life of a girl who is in love with her teacher and her mysterious teacher who may or may not be aware of the girl's feelings.

Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

description.pt-br:
Odette é uma psiquiatra que transmigrou para os tempos medievais. Para voltar aos tempos modernos, ela precisava ajudar Rion, um rei com múltiplas personalidades, condição causada por seu trauma mental depois que ele decapitou sua própria esposa. 

Odette é cercada então pelo  caos, a bobagem e a loucura enquanto ela lida com as personalidades divididas em constante mudança de Rion.

description.en: Enter a world where the First Space War has ended, and Earth has claimed its first extraterrestrial colony. Manabu Houo, a boy born into a totalitarian state, finds his only joy in watching forbidden movies with his childhood friend, Hina-chan. However, one day upon returning home, he finds a group of government officials waiting for him...?! Watch as this thrilling sci-fi school drama unfolds on a distant planet!

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

altTitles.en: The World Where the Beloved Sister Disappeared
A World Without My Sister Who Everyone Loved

altTitles.zh: 备受宠爱的姐姐消失的世界

altTitles.es-la: El Mundo Sin Mi Hermana a Quien Todos Amaban

altTitles.es: El Mundo en el que Desapareció la Amada Hermana

description.en:
"I hate you enough to want to kill you, Sienna."

I was my sister’s shadow all my life, and I was betrayed by her and died. But… people have changed since the day I came back in time.

"You're the only child Nacht chose."

"His Highness recognizes you as family."

Something's wrong. These people seem to mistake me for my older sister.

"I beg you, believe in us for once, that we care for you."

I once wanted to be loved. Now I fear that this mindset will become my weakness. One betrayal was enough. Everything is over when you bet everything in love. I just want to get my life back so…
description.es: Te odio lo suficiente como para querer matarte, Sienna. Ella fue la sombra de su hermana toda su vida y fue traicionada por ella. Lo único que podía elegir era mi propia muerte. “Lo siento hermana, no podré conceder tu deseo de matarme”. Por cierto… Las personas de la mansión Natch que regresaron en el tiempo son diferentes a las de antes. “Eres la única niña que ha elegido el Gran duque”. “Su Alteza lo reconoce como miembro de su familia”. Algo está mal. Es como si estas personas me confundieran con mi hermana mayor. “Te lo estoy diciendo créeme solo una vez. Nosotros nos preocupamos por ti”. Una vez quise ser amado. Ahora tengo miedo de que ese corazón se convierta en una debilidad. Una traición fue suficiente para quitarme la vida. Se acabó el tiempo de apostar todo al amor. Sólo quiero recuperar mi vida. ‘Si no amo, ya no me lastimarán’. “Ahora es tiempo de ir por caminos separados”.
description.es-la: Te odio lo suficiente como para querer matarte, Sienna. Ella fue la sombra de su hermana toda su vida y fue traicionada por ella. Lo único que podía elegir era mi propia muerte. “Lo siento hermana, no podré conceder tu deseo de matarme”. Por cierto… Las personas de la mansión Natch que regresaron en el tiempo son diferentes a las de antes. “Eres la única niña que ha elegido el Gran duque”. “Su Alteza lo reconoce como miembro de su familia”. Algo está mal. Es como si estas personas me confundieran con mi hermana mayor. “Te lo estoy diciendo créeme solo una vez. Nosotros nos preocupamos por ti”. Una vez quise ser amado. Ahora tengo miedo de que ese corazón se convierta en una debilidad. Una traición fue suficiente para quitarme la vida. Se acabó el tiempo de apostar todo al amor. Sólo quiero recuperar mi vida. ‘Si no amo, ya no me lastimarán’. “Ahora es tiempo de ir por caminos separados”.

title.en: Jojoni Deremi ga Mashiteku Tsundere Gyaru

altTitles.ja: 徐々にデレ味が増してくツンデレギャル

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng gal tsundere ngày càng đáng yêu hơn

altTitles.ja-ro: Jojoni Deremi ga Mashiteku Tsundere Gal

altTitles.tr: Tsundere Gal Günden Güne Daha Sevimli Hale Geliyor

altTitles.en: The Tsundere Gal Whose Dere Side Gradually Increases

title.en: The Start of a Stunning and Feisty Master: A System with Ten Pounds of Rebellion

altTitles.zh: 开局绝色俏师父：系统十斤反骨

altTitles.zh-ro: Kaiju Juese Qiao Shifu: Xitong Shi Jin Fan Gu

altTitles.en: Beginning With a Stunning Master: The System Is 10-Catty Reverse Bones

altTitles.zh-ro: Kai Ju Jue Se Qiao Shifu: Xitong Shi Jin Fan Gu

altTitles.vi: Khởi Đầu Tuyệt Sắc Nữ Sư Phụ, Hệ Thống Thập Cân Phản Cốt

altTitles.pt-br: O surgimento de um mestre poderoso e espirituoso: Um sistema com dez quilos de rebeldia

description.en: Comedy + Transmigration System. My name is Xia Chi. I originally thought that the four female masters would act as my bodyguards on the path to becoming a god, but little did I know, each of them has their own ulterior motives. They actually want me to be their little cotton-padded jacket!?
description.zh: 搞笑+系统穿越。我叫夏迟,原以为四位女师父作为保 镖护我一路封神成为圣子,没想到她们各怀鬼胎,竟想 让我当她们的小棉袄!?

description.en:
It’s called Erotic Comic Department so it may cause some misunderstandings, but the misunderstandings are right!!  
Sangyeol, the club president who loves erotic comics, and Sunjeong, who loves every type of comic except for erotic comics.  
And to protect the existence of the club, they work together in making an erotic romantic-comedy school comic!
description.id:
Namanya Departemen Komik Erotis jadi mungkin menimbulkan beberapa kesalahpahaman, tapi kesalahpahaman itu benar!!
Sangyeol, presiden klub yang menyukai komik erotis, dan Sunjeong, yang menyukai semua jenis komik kecuali komik erotis.
Dan untuk melindungi keberadaan klub, mereka bekerja sama dalam membuat komik sekolah komedi romantis erotis!

description.en: The cow Ushiharu was brought to the middle schooler Kiyoharu's farm. To the people around him, she appears as just a normal cow, but just to him, she appears as a sexy cow-girl…!?
description.ru: Корову Усихару привезли на ферму старшеклассника Киёхару. Для окружающих она выглядит как обычная корова, но только для него она выглядит как сексуальная корова!?
description.vi: Một con bò sữa được mang về trang trại của cậu học sinh Kiyoharu. Xung quanh cậu, ai cũng thấy đó chỉ là một con bò bình thường, nhưng chỉ riêng Kiyoharu thì đó không còn là một con bò nữa rồi...
